cardsPerView.name: Cards per view
cardsPerView.desc: Number of cards to display at once

folderSelection.name: Folder Selection
folderSelection.desc: Choose whether to use the active file's folder or a selected folder

selectFolder.name: Select Folder
selectFolder.desc: Choose a folder for Card Navigator

defaultSortMethod.name: Default sort method
defaultSortMethod.desc: Choose the default sorting method for cards

fixedCardHeight.name: Fixed Card Height
fixedCardHeight.desc: If enabled, all cards will have the same height. If disabled, card height will adjust to content.

renderContentAsHtml.name: Render Content as HTML
renderContentAsHtml.desc: If enabled, card content will be rendered as HTML

centerActiveCardOnOpen.name: Center Active Card on Open
centerActiveCardOnOpen.desc: Automatically center the active card when opening the Card Navigator

centerCardMethod.name: Center Card Method
centerCardMethod.desc: Choose how to center the active card in the view

animationDuration.name: Animation Duration
animationDuration.desc: Set the duration of the card animation (in milliseconds)

dragDropContent.name: Drag and Drop Content
dragDropContent.desc: When enabled, dragging a card will insert the note content instead of a link.

showFileName.name: Show File Name
showFileName.desc: Toggle to display or hide the file name on cards

showFirstHeader.name: Show First Header
showFirstHeader.desc: Toggle to display or hide the first header on cards

showContent.name: Show Content
showContent.desc: Toggle to display or hide the content on cards

fileName.name: File Name Size
fileName.desc: Set the font size for the file name

firstHeader.name: First Header Size
firstHeader.desc: Set the font size for the first header

content.name: Content Size
content.desc: Set the font size for the content

contentLength.name: Content Length
contentLength.desc: Maximum content length displayed on each card
